= Database Structure of Ajax Portal =

== Introduction ==

Ajax Portal supports the following base services:
  # Authenticaton 
  # 2 kinds of Authorization (role based and permission based),
  # Multy-service support for one user,
  # Customization functionality (possibility to create a new portlet, change the parameter(s) of existing portlet, delete a portlet, to move the portlet in the region or move the portlet in another region),
  # Repository - a storage of all known portlets, porjaxs, plug-ins, widgets and mobile Web applications. The repository supports a hierarchy for the portlets. The portlets can be associated with portal page.
